short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically hides and marks posters who use memeflags when posting to hide their country of origin.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically hides and marks posters who try to hide their country of origin.
